casebody.data:
EVANS
v.
LAND. No. 278P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of June 2007 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Writ of Mandamus and Prohibitive Order":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
